segment.source: Windows security baselines (Windows 10)
segment.target: Windows security baselines (Windows 10)

segment.source: Use this topic to learn what security baselines are and how you can use them in your organization to help keep your devices secure.
segment.target: Use this topic to learn what security baselines are and how you can use them in your organization to help keep your devices secure.

segment.source: Windows security baselines
segment.target: Windows security baselines

segment.source: Microsoft is dedicated to provide our customers with a secure operating system, such as Windows 10 and Windows Server, as well as secure apps, such as Microsoft Edge.
segment.target: Microsoft is dedicated to provide our customers with a secure operating system, such as Windows 10 and Windows Server, as well as secure apps, such as Microsoft Edge.

segment.source: In addition to the security assurance of its products, Microsoft also enables you to have fine control of your environments by providing various configuration capabilities.
segment.target: In addition to the security assurance of its products, Microsoft also enables you to have fine control of your environments by providing various configuration capabilities.

segment.source: Even though Windows and Windows Server are designed to be secure out-of-the-box, a large number of organizations still want more granular control of their security configurations.
segment.target: Even though Windows and Windows Server are designed to be secure out-of-the-box, a large number of organizations still want more granular control of their security configurations.

segment.source: To navigate these large number of controls, organizations need guidance for configuring various security features.
segment.target: To navigate these large number of controls, organizations need guidance for configuring various security features.

segment.source: Microsoft provides this guidance in the form of security baselines.
segment.target: Microsoft provides this guidance in the form of security baselines.

segment.source: We recommend implementing an industry-standard configuration that is broadly known and well-tested, such as a Mirosoft security baseline, as opposed to creating one yourself.
segment.target: We recommend implementing an industry-standard configuration that is broadly known and well-tested, such as a Mirosoft security baseline, as opposed to creating one yourself.

segment.source: This helps increase flexibility and reduce costs.
segment.target: This helps increase flexibility and reduce costs.

segment.source: What are security baselines?
segment.target: What are security baselines?

segment.source: Every organization faces security threats.
segment.target: Every organization faces security threats.

segment.source: However, the types of security threats that are of most concern to one organization can be completely different from another organization.
segment.target: However, the types of security threats that are of most concern to one organization can be completely different from another organization.

segment.source: For example, an e-commerce company may focus on protecting their Internet-facing web apps, while a hospital may focus on protecting confidential patient information.
segment.target: For example, an e-commerce company may focus on protecting their Internet-facing web apps, while a hospital may focus on protecting confidential patient information.

segment.source: The one thing that all organizations have in common is a need to keep their apps and devices secure.
segment.target: The one thing that all organizations have in common is a need to keep their apps and devices secure.

segment.source: These devices must be compliant with the security standards (or security baselines) defined by the organization.
segment.target: These devices must be compliant with the security standards (or security baselines) defined by the organization.

segment.source: A security baseline is a collection of settings that have a security impact and include Microsoft’s recommended value for configuring those settings along with guidance on the security impact of those settings.
segment.target: A security baseline is a collection of settings that have a security impact and include Microsoft’s recommended value for configuring those settings along with guidance on the security impact of those settings.

segment.source: These settings are based on feedback from Microsoft security engineering teams, product groups, partners, and customers.
segment.target: These settings are based on feedback from Microsoft security engineering teams, product groups, partners, and customers.

segment.source: Why are security baselines needed?
segment.target: Why are security baselines needed?

segment.source: Security baselines are an essential benefit to customers because they bring together expert knowlege from Microsoft, partners, and customers.
segment.target: Security baselines are an essential benefit to customers because they bring together expert knowlege from Microsoft, partners, and customers.

segment.source: For example, there are over 3,000 Group Policy settings for Windows 10, which does not include over 1,800 Internet Explorer 11 settings.
segment.target: For example, there are over 3,000 Group Policy settings for Windows 10, which does not include over 1,800 Internet Explorer 11 settings.

segment.source: Of those 3,800 settings, only some of them are security-related.
segment.target: Of those 3,800 settings, only some of them are security-related.

segment.source: While Microsoft provides extensive guidance on different security features, going through each of them can take a long time.
segment.target: While Microsoft provides extensive guidance on different security features, going through each of them can take a long time.

segment.source: You would have to determine the security impact of each setting on your own.
segment.target: You would have to determine the security impact of each setting on your own.

segment.source: After you've done that, you still need to determine what values each of these settings should be.
segment.target: After you've done that, you still need to determine what values each of these settings should be.

segment.source: In modern organizations, the security threat landscape is constantly evolving.
segment.target: In modern organizations, the security threat landscape is constantly evolving.

segment.source: IT pros and policy makers must keep current with security threats and changes to Windows security settings to help mitigate these threats.
segment.target: IT pros and policy makers must keep current with security threats and changes to Windows security settings to help mitigate these threats.

segment.source: To help faster deployments and increase the ease of managing Windows, Microsoft provides customers with security baselines that are available in formats that can be consumed, such as Group Policy Objects backups.
segment.target: To help faster deployments and increase the ease of managing Windows, Microsoft provides customers with security baselines that are available in formats that can be consumed, such as Group Policy Objects backups.

segment.source: How can you use security baselines?
segment.target: How can you use security baselines?

segment.source: You can use security baselines to:
segment.target: You can use security baselines to:

segment.source: Ensure that user and device configuration settings are compliant with the baseline.
segment.target: Ensure that user and device configuration settings are compliant with the baseline.

segment.source: Set configuration settings.
segment.target: Set configuration settings.

segment.source: For example, you can use Group Policy, System Center Configuration Manager, or Microsoft Intune to configure a device with the setting values specified in the baseline.
segment.target: For example, you can use Group Policy, System Center Configuration Manager, or Microsoft Intune to configure a device with the setting values specified in the baseline.

segment.source: Where can I get the security baselines?
segment.target: Where can I get the security baselines?

segment.source: Here's a list of security baselines that are currently available.
segment.target: Here's a list of security baselines that are currently available.

segment.source: Note: If you want to know what has changed with each security baseline, or if you want to stay up-to-date on what’s happening with them, check out the Microsoft Security Guidance blog.
segment.target: Note: If you want to know what has changed with each security baseline, or if you want to stay up-to-date on what’s happening with them, check out the Microsoft Security Guidance blog.

segment.target: Windows 10, Version 1507 security baseline
